content.rendered:
Photo by Gratisography

This Week in Genesis (#58)…

  • new and beautiful themes,
  • two fantastic Genesis plugin updates,
  • an awesome (and free) accessibility talk that will rock your world,
  • someone’s launching a book,
  • tutorials, beautiful showcase sites, and oh so much more.

Let’s do this.

Themes

There were no new Genesis theme releases last week but boy did you all make up for it this week

First up a stylish new StudioPress theme from StudioPress themselves, Wellness Pro.

Announcing our new theme, Wellness Pro: A Holistic Solution for a Healthy Websitehttps://t.co/9zeEF33L6r #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/XCIDwqQWFN

— Lauren Mancke (@laurenmancke) July 6, 2016

And it’s already being well received…

Gorgeous theme! I'm setting up my new health & fitness blog on this theme right now! #WellnessPro #GenesisWP https://t.co/FmzGnZVNBq

— Susan Ramsey (@onehappystudio) July 7, 2016

Next up, a gorgeous new WooCommerce focused theme from WP Studio, Seasons Pro, and I can see this one being popular. Great work.

Say hello to Seasons Pro, a Genesis e-commerce theme. https://t.co/nIAmbvob8j #genesiswp #wordpress #woocommerce pic.twitter.com/CGX4nKm1tn

— WPStudio (@wpstudiowp) July 7, 2016

Showcase

If you’re a Gravity Forms nut (like me), you’ll dig this new site from Shaan Nicol for local-helper.com (for more details on the implementation just check out the comments on the GenesisWP.guide listing).

New on https://t.co/vUGfVnMBds, smart new #genesiswp site from @chillybindesign for https://t.co/8vNSxUE7yj pic.twitter.com/1uPKuolKHE

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) July 6, 2016

Next up, fantastic work from Kevin Donnigan for ourtrueheroes.org

New on https://t.co/vUGfVnMBds, fantastic showcase site from @anythinggraphic for https://t.co/300Vp0PKeg pic.twitter.com/ZjbAl8UPTR

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) July 4, 2016

Great looking recruitment site from Claire Lobel for ogierecruitment.com

New on https://t.co/vUGfVnMBds, this fantastic showcase site for https://t.co/ztQiVb0AIr by @clairelobel pic.twitter.com/eN8YuDQKEi

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) July 4, 2016

As well as launching a new theme, WPStudio have a nice looking new site too, wpstud.io

updated and freshen up the design of https://t.co/UallkAuOMj

— WPStudio (@wpstudiowp) July 1, 2016

Justin McGuire for crossofcalvary.net

After a long weekend it's nice to start the week off with a website launch. https://t.co/qSen6xcQzr #GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/ok0QlhZaFK

— Justin McGuire (@jemcgui) July 5, 2016

Showcase regulars Pilcrow + Pixel for sacksmorasha.org.uk

Just launched: a new #genesiswp site for Sacks Morasha Primary School in North London: https://t.co/CpLGuJXQeJ

— Pilcrow + Pixel (@PilcrowPixel) July 5, 2016

Nicola Tweed for birdanddesign.com

New birdie launch – https://t.co/PJg5wy1ptp Based on the lovely Kindred theme from @stnsvn #genesiswp @birdanddesign pic.twitter.com/K7inIc44iU

— Nicola Tweed (@nicolatweed) July 6, 2016

Good use of Themedy’s Richmond theme by Samantha Faunce Sand over at trolleycat.com

Awesome use of our Richmand theme by @trolleycats at https://t.co/3IR2VK6uL2 #genesiswp

— Themedy Team (@themedythemes) July 6, 2016

New site on Appfinite’s Guru theme for preventnostics.com

Check out this amazing site built with the Guru Theme! – https://t.co/SgtQJdJiNp #WordPress #genesiswp

— appfinite (@appfinite) July 5, 2016

…and also on an Appfinite theme – Aspire Pro – chinesetalkeze.com

Another fantastic site built with the Aspire Pro Theme – https://t.co/qR1xKsKqlf#genesiswp #WordPress

— Wes Straham (@WesStraham) July 1, 2016

Podcasts

OK, it’s not technically a podcast but I definitely don’t want you to miss Rian Rietveld’s WordCamp Europe talk on ‘WordPress, state of the accessibility’ – and, yes, Genesis is mentioned 😉 – (h/t Gary Jones).

.@RianRietveld's WordCamp Europe talk, 'WordPress, state of the accessibility' https://t.co/G85ljWtBBr (h/t @GaryJ) pic.twitter.com/DgPXcGvSyD

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) July 1, 2016

Next up, the folks at Imagely are on a podcast mission at the moment and this episode they’re discussing Beaver Builder, which I know is a popular page builder option for a lot of you Genesis peeps out there.

New on https://t.co/vUGfVnMBds, new podcast from @imagely, discussing Beaver Builder, Genesis and more https://t.co/LFtsj9TPVe

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) July 7, 2016

Plugins

Ren updates his Author Box Reloaded plugin to v1.1.0.

Just updated #GenesisWP Author Box Reloaded. Version 1.1.0 is now available. https://t.co/Jn759mL79O

— Ren V. (@CLE_Ren) July 2, 2016

And there’s a sweet looking 2.0 update to the Genesis Columns Advanced plugin by Nick Diego.

#genesiswp column classes are great, but want a better way to add them? Genesis Columns Advanced v2.0 is out today: https://t.co/woVWZNV0eH

— Nick Diego (@nickmdiego) July 7, 2016

Best of the rest

As many of you know, I’m a big fan of the work Tonya is doing over at Know The Code, particularly her focus on Genesis, and once again she’s delivering the goods with an update to The Loop Part 2 – Developer’s Guide to Customising Genesis this week…

Tomorrow & Friday – I'm finishing The Loop Part 2 – Developer's Guide to Customizing Genesis https://t.co/TSIIAJsglD #genesiswp

— Know The Code (@KnowTheCodePro) July 6, 2016

…and a new series – Let’s Build A Developer’s Genesis Starter Child Theme – to look forward to next week.

Then next week [drumroll] it's all Let’s Build a Developer’s Genesis Starter Child Theme meaning videos https://t.co/9TJppIk8nE #genesiswp

— Know The Code (@KnowTheCodePro) July 6, 2016

Next up, if you end up manually adding your Featured Images to the top of every post or page anyway, why not just do it automatically with code? Learn how to Add Featured Image at top of Single Post/Page in Genesis by Neil Gee…

Add Featured Image at top of Single Post/Page automatically in #GenesisWP https://t.co/S7MfJIXroY

— Neil Gee (@_neilgee) July 7, 2016

…and another nice little tutorial from him as well, on Giving Comments Fields Some Full Width Love.

Give Comments Fields Some Full Width Love https://t.co/cghHFNMMzg #genesiswp

— Neil Gee (@_neilgee) June 30, 2016

Jackie D’Elia on how to add custom client training videos to the WP dashboard and be totally awesome…

Learn how to add custom client training videos to the WP dashboard and be totally awesome. #WordPress https://t.co/jflf4Kz75y via @jdelia

— Jackie D'Elia (@jdelia) June 30, 2016

…and adding cool SVG animations to your WordPress content and styling it with CSS.

Add cool SVG animation to your WordPress content and style it with CSS. #WordPress #SVG https://t.co/bcF6pDiOR1 via @jdelia

— Jackie D'Elia (@jdelia) July 7, 2016

New tutorial from Susan Ramsey on setting up the homepage of the Pretty Creative theme from Pretty Darn Cute…

I've published a https://t.co/qn5X7q5nEK #GenesisWP #Genesis4Beginners tutorial: Home Page setup of #PrettyCreative pic.twitter.com/OxOuZfLHLT

— Susan Ramsey (@onehappystudio) July 3, 2016

Last week’s guest editor, Susan Ramsey is offering 24 hour Genesis theme setup, if you need a helping hand.

Put up your feet & relax; let me do the work for you. #GenesisWP #WordPress theme setup: https://t.co/x2Pk3xatCD pic.twitter.com/pFRyLEnrBc

— Susan Ramsey (@onehappystudio) July 4, 2016

Great tutorial from Anita (aka The Cre8tive Diva) on how to embed a Pinterest widget in your WordPress post using Genesis…

How to Embed a Pinterest Widget in your WordPress Post Using Genesis https://t.co/PLHqlaEI61 #bloggers #bbloggers #foodies #genesiswp

— Anita C. (@TheCre8tiveDiva) July 3, 2016

….plus she’s just launched a new Facebook page, you know what to do 🙂

Finally set up a Facebook Page. I have 6 Likes. LOL! I wonder if I can get more? https://t.co/W6CE5Fy0oR.. #genesiswp #wordpress #bloggers

— Anita C. (@TheCre8tiveDiva) July 6, 2016

Sridhar’s been busy doing what Sridhar does best, cranking out tutorials for you all:

  • How to set up an animated Search form in Genesis (updated for Genesis Sample theme)
  • How to add Phone and Snapchat icons in Simple Social Icons widget (handy…)
  • Multiple Background Images for Cafe Pro’s Front Page Header using Backstretch and Soliloquy

Updated How to set up animated Search form in Genesis tut, https://t.co/6lErRofpjV to add steps for Genesis Sample. pic.twitter.com/a2b0dM3Vf0

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) July 4, 2016

How to add Phone and Snapchat icons in Simple Social Icons widget:https://t.co/bnzRboqffW

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) July 4, 2016

Multiple Background Images for Cafe Pro's Front Page Header using Backstretch & Soliloquy:https://t.co/BMlXaT8R51https://t.co/6nruW85Vka

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) July 4, 2016

Elizabeth Jamieson on building your own countdown timer for sales pages in Genesis.

Build your own Countdown Timer for sales pages on #genesiswp – Easy Steps https://t.co/uKLIA11nBf

— Elizabeth Jamieson (@genesisclubliz) July 3, 2016

And finally…

If it wasn’t enough that she was teaching you all to be more awesome developers via Know The Code, you can now learn from Tonya in book form too, check out Be a More Awesome Developer, coming soon.

Hey #WordPress -> Sign up for my book:

Be a More Awesome Developer
Roadmap to Continually Level Up in WordPresshttps://t.co/CFmgqGgzqt

— Tonya Mork (@hellofromTonya) July 7, 2016

That’s all for this week.

I’ll be back very soon though with another edition of your favourite round-up of all the finest things happening in Genesis.

Until next time, let’s keep Genesis awesome.

PS If you enjoy these updates, please consider subscribing below, it always make my day. Thanks!

excerpt.rendered: New themes from StudioPress and WPStudio, two fantastic Genesis plugin updates, and an awesome (and free) accessibility talk that will rock your world.
